name: ImmersionOfTheReader
description:
Game Overview: 

Immersion of the Reader is a 2D platformer which transports you to

another world as you immerse yourself in the experience of reading

a book with multiple chapters of the main avatar’s favorite story

appearing as fully animated scenes. The goal is to collect all the

pages whilst avoiding the enemies and plot holes that threaten your

progress in order to reach the end of the narrative.
